advice: Make sure that you employ people who understand their roles, want to improve your products and have the knowledge and experience to do this. Most importantly listen to them and get your head out of the 'Its ok we did this for the last 5-10 years and it worked' attitude. Your miles behind your competitors in tech and quality due to this mindset. Also consider more support, training and pay the people what they deserve and more, that's how you keep them at the company. Only keeping management happy with high pay is a sure way to lose decent people.
